0P00008SPT.HK.long_name: Hang Seng Mandatory Provident Fund-SuperTrust Plus-European Equity Fund
0P00008SPT.HK.summary: The investment objective of the European Equity Fund is to achieve long-term capital growth through a pooled investment fund that indirectly invests in a portfolio of carefully selected shares traded on any of the eligible markets in the United Kingdom and in other continental European countries.

0P0000FYUD.HK.long_name: BCT (MPF) Pro Choice-BCT (Pro) European Equity Fund
0P0000FYUD.HK.summary:
The objective of the European Equity Fund is to provide members with long term capital appreciation by investing primarily in âInvesco Pooled Investment Fund â Europe Fundâ which is an APIF and in turn invests in a portfolio of listed securities in Europe (including the United Kingdom).
In normal circumstances, the underlying APIF will invest up to 100% of its net assets in European (including United Kingdom) securities. The underlying APIF will not engage in any securities lending. Futures and options will be used for hedging purpose only. As the underlying APIF will be mainly invested in the stock markets in Europe (including the United Kingdom), the inherent risk and return of the European Equity Fund will be associated with the European (including United Kingdom) stock markets.

0P0000X0L8.HK.long_name: BOC-Prudential Easy-Choice MPF Scheme-BOC-Prudential European Index Tracking Fund
0P0000X0L8.HK.summary: The BOC-Prudential European Index Tracking Fund is an equity fund which aims to achieve long term capital growth by investing primarily in an approved ITCIS selected by the Investment Manager. Currently, this fund exclusively invests in the approved ITCIS â the BOC-Prudential European Index Fund, a sub-fund of the BOC-Prudential Index Fund Series, which invests in a portfolio of securities traded on the stock exchanges in the United Kingdom and in other continental European countries.

BBVAE50A.MX.short_name: BBVA BANCOMER GESTION SA FDO BB
BBVAE50A.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Eurotop SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
BBVAE50A.MX.summary: The objective is to provide investors BBVAE50 the option of investing predominantly in European stock market, live and / or through collective investment schemes such as Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs by its acronym in English) and / or Titles Referenced to Shares (TRACs), quoted in pesos or in foreign currency. The Fund also may invest in derivative instruments and / or warrants on recognized markets under the provisions issued by the CNBV and Banco de Mexico, denominated in local currency and / or foreign.

BLKEURVA.MX.short_name: BLK Acciones Europa SA de CV F
BLKEURVA.MX.long_name: BLK Acciones Europa SA de CV F.I.R.V. A
BLKEURVA.MX.summary: BNMEURV is an investment company that invests predominately (minimum 80% of the total assets) in actions that belong to the European stock market, either directly, through ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds) or by means of the acquisition of shares of national and/or foreign equity investment companies. Stocks and ETFs must be listed in the international system of quotes ("SIC") or listed on the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores. BNMEURV will seek to offer a competitive performance with respect to the performance of the STOXX Europe 50 index, less costs and taxes in the respective series.
BLKEURVA.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV
